A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was an abomination. Too late to start over\, so I hope JJ can pull a rabbit out of his hat for E9. TFA was flawed and completely unoriginal\, but at least it felt more like SW than TLJ.  Hopefully KK steps down and RJ never directs another film the rest of his life.  One this for sure\, I won't be paying to see E9 unless heads roll immediately.
